messages.message: Showing toolbar on hover hides the top portion of the page

you should still see the top of the page if you don’t hover over the page

is there a case where you want to see the toolbar and the top part of the page at the same time?

So I started with my mouse on the image and initially thought the toolbar was overlapping and hiding the top part. Tried zooming but that still was overlapping. Later realised that moving the mouse away makes the top bar disappear.
I think this could work, but I'm personally not used to this pattern of not being able to see the text when you're hovering over it. It may appear unintuitive.

yeah we’ve discussed this multiple times https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C04TSMWLPAS/p1694733485900869?thread_ts=1694689107.111259&cid=C04TSMWLPAS

you don’t see this behavior on converse, right? you only see this on build and/or app results?
